alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Garza; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 7:04PM CDT until May 22 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... North central Garza County in northwestern Texas... Southern Crosby County in northwestern Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Lorenzo, or 12 miles northeast of Slaton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Slaton, Crosbyton, Ralls, Lorenzo and Caprock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
